panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr:
(
  sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle", group!~"firewall|^$"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  / on(instance) group_left 
  sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{group!~"firewall|^$"}[$__rate_interval]))
) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

targets.expr:
(sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle", group!="Firewall"}[$__rate_interval])) 
/ on(instance) group_left 
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{group!="Firewall"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 100

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device
panels.title: Disk IO
